edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj

Class FilteredSpriteSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj.SpriteSheet
      • edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj.FilteredSpriteSheet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class FilteredSpriteSheet
extends SpriteSheet
implements Renderable
    A SpriteSheet graphics object which will support filters
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer Imbleau
    See Also:
    AbstractFilter

      • build

        public void build(int tileX,
                  int tileY)
        Applies all filters to a specific sprite. This does not update all of the sprites.
        Parameters:
        tileX - - the index of the tile's x coordinate
        tileY - - the index of the tile's y coordinate
